00029 RainbruRPG::Options::LanguageListItem::LanguageListItem(){
00030   languageCode="";
00031   countryCode="";
00032   languageText="";
00033   countryText="";
00034   completePerCent=0.0f;
00035   defaultLanguage=false;
00036   currentLanguage=false;
00037 
00038 }

00043 RainbruRPG::Options::LanguageListItem::
00044 LanguageListItem(const LanguageListItem& l){
00045   languageCode=l.languageCode;
00046   countryCode=l.countryCode;
00047   languageText=l.languageText;
00048   countryText=l.countryText;
00049   completePerCent=l.completePerCent;
00050   defaultLanguage=l.defaultLanguage;
00051   currentLanguage=l.currentLanguage;
00052 
00053 }

00168 const char* RainbruRPG::Options::LanguageListItem::getComboText(){
00169   std::string s=languageText;
00170   s+=" (";
00171   s+=countryText;
00172   s+=") ";
00173 
00174   if (!defaultLanguage){
00175     s+=StringConv::getSingleton().ftos(completePerCent);
00176     s+="% ";
00177   }
00178 
00179   if (defaultLanguage)
00180     s+="default ";
00181 
00182   if (currentLanguage)
00183     s+="current ";
00184 
00185   return s.c_str();
00186 }

00220 bool RainbruRPG::Options::LanguageListItem::isCurrent(){

00232 const char* RainbruRPG::Options::LanguageListItem::getLanguageCountry(){
00233   std::string s=languageCode;
00234   s+="_";
00235   s+=countryCode;
00236 
00237   return s.c_str();
00238 }
